summary: Professional website for Ethos Towing Services INC, a towing company based in Fresno, California, offering services within 200-400 miles radius, operated by an experienced team, featuring a professional, modern, authoritative design with full authority emphasis and easy navigation. Contact form submissions are stored in the backend canister and can be accessed manually or through an admin panel. Website will include an integrated chatbot for customer interaction.
architectural_notes: Website type: Professional service business website for towing company
Target audience: Customers needing towing services in Fresno, CA area
Color scheme: Red, white, and blue as primary colors
Design emphasis: Full authority, professional, modern aesthetic
Navigation: Easy, intuitive user experience is primary goal
Chatbot integration: Will need to add customer interaction chat functionality to the website

existing_features.title: Create a hero section displaying 'Ethos Towing Services INC' as the company name, tagline highlighting experienced towing services, and location in Fresno, California
Display service area coverage information showing 200-400 miles radius from Fresno for special requests
Create a services overview section listing common towing services offered (e.g., emergency towing, long-distance towing, roadside assistance, vehicle recovery)
Build a contact form allowing customers to request towing services with fields for name, phone number, location, vehicle type, and service details
Create an 'About Us' or 'Our Team' section highlighting the experienced team and company credentials
Display prominent contact information including phone number and email for emergency towing requests

Design a professional, trustworthy visual theme using automotive industry-appropriate colors (avoid blue and purple), incorporating bold typography and clean layouts that convey reliability and emergency readiness

Replace the main hero section background image with a new professional tow truck photo
